04f264317ab6180a39bf2733b43f40e61a2c3b0a.query:
SELECT value
            FROM group_config
            WHERE group_config.chat_id = lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($1) AND name = $2
            ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1

072f943d0d5ded261ee897034ca49d9e119c66e4.query: UPDATE chat_administrator SET chat_id = $1 WHERE chat_id = $2

178a4d8008c057c86538a8044044426e9923eda2.query:
INSERT INTO chat_administrator (account_id, chat_id, is_admin, updated_at)
                VALUES (lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1), lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($2), $3, to_timestamp($4::bigint))

1aacdd98f714b8e1f589859dca9ef2ad3bff73fd.query:
INSERT INTO video_job_message (video_id, chat_id, message_id) VALUES
                ($1, lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($2), $3)

2d0eb75f282ed83d99e5ef77e8344bb672774245.query:
SELECT id, processed, source, url, mp4_url, thumb_url, display_url, display_name, job_id
            FROM videos
            WHERE source = $1

363ba13615df3a63979c903648af4bd50feafed5.query: UPDATE permission SET chat_id = $1 WHERE chat_id = $2

38a3fbffae225644f875826d08afdaba40e98c45.query:
INSERT INTO twitter_account (account_id, consumer_key, consumer_secret) VALUES
                (lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1), $2, $3)

3c6b4bea1e8e2028a5271f7c4e8cf11965e1887a.query:
DELETE FROM twitter_auth
            WHERE account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1)

41d7843ef58b2e8a73f77d63b820684f5c716ccf.query:
INSERT INTO source_notification (account_id, hash, message_id, photo_id)
                VALUES (lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1), $2, $3, $4) ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING

4bf1e2603910e4ef6f67ad369260e0dc3b903787.query:
SELECT id, processed, source, url, mp4_url, thumb_url, display_url, display_name, job_id
            FROM videos
            WHERE display_name = $1

5af4076aa90de9643172ba3f12f731ee09a43843.query:
INSERT INTO user_config (account_id, name, value)
            VALUES (lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1), $2, $3)

608059a2b5b4a8855417901072923f5a8bb28b5b.query:
SELECT account.telegram_id user_id, hash, message_id, photo_id
            FROM source_notification
            JOIN account ON account.id = source_notification.account_id
            WHERE hash <@ ($1, 3)

66f224396a3d4330a584349bea657f0eca671234.query:
INSERT INTO cached_post (post_url, thumb, cdn_url, width, height) VALUES
                ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5) RETURNING id

68a84647d56342e43c5e49025cd3f0129452ebec.query:
SELECT id, post_url, thumb, cdn_url, width, height
            FROM cached_post
            WHERE post_url = $1 AND thumb = $2

6960bf8689597c72138beb25b305d60cd2e28cd6.query:
DELETE FROM chat_administrator
            WHERE chat_id = lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($1) AND account_id <> lookup_account_by_telegram_id($2)

737ea3245f4fb679de13f733b4ccf1b81adc5939.query:
DELETE FROM user_config
            WHERE account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1) AND name = $2

7676c2d336dca998f8513860d58ac394b7e6340c.query:
DELETE FROM twitter_account
            WHERE account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1)

7f9bdd51e9430d93edebd6180a5ac2ad0d7172eb.query: UPDATE videos SET job_id = $1 WHERE id = $2

82f6e2f376c7d0a86b5489b320831fb1ac15bb8a.query: UPDATE video_job_message SET chat_id = $1 WHERE chat_id = $2

85de52f6850d5eb3adfc19467a43ee693a063c08.query:
SELECT value
            FROM user_config
            WHERE user_config.account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1) AND name = $2
            ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1

86d9f856585958d5a3980996fd2a3f04a21f60ac.query:
SELECT message_id
            FROM video_job_message
            WHERE video_id = $1

87e03d42c67970bc449869d979cece93a8102c1f.query:
SELECT account.telegram_id user_id, request_key, request_secret
            FROM twitter_auth
            JOIN account ON account.id = twitter_auth.account_id
            WHERE request_key = $1

8bac1a20c07f94bbbdc4292f66683677934f92c5.query:
INSERT INTO group_config (chat_id, name, value) VALUES
                (lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($1), $2, $3)

8c56e3f05f3efa027c2db1b3225d2df695fbfb1a.query:
SELECT consumer_key, consumer_secret
            FROM twitter_account
            WHERE twitter_account.account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1)

abc8fe7876be76ec0835a9e32d99caa5761a46d6.query: UPDATE videos SET processed = true, mp4_url = $1, thumb_url = $2 WHERE id = $3

ac2cf1c97f5d138636445a9229cad027ec12d89f.query:
INSERT INTO permission (chat_id, updated_at, permissions) VALUES
                (lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($1), to_timestamp($2::int), $3)

be823b9738decf3ac8c9f0574a984a5ee07829a4.query: LOCK TABLE chat, chat_telegram IN EXCLUSIVE MODE

bfba897adbca6cade6202ee3b47a646c01c21831.query: UPDATE chat_telegram SET chat_id = $1 WHERE telegram_id = $2

ccbff78ccf9a1a19a65a95d192ccb1ead5dbe14e.query:
INSERT INTO twitter_auth (account_id, request_key, request_secret) VALUES
                (lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1), $2, $3)

d2d469f0c96e2c695dac67da5065d1f645b86ab8.query:
INSERT INTO videos (source, url, display_url, display_name) VALUES
                ($1, $2, $3, $4)
            ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT unique_source
                DO UPDATE SET source = EXCLUDED.source
            RETURNING display_name

d3d3cc97bad752504d1604aa4004aac0abb5d897.query:
SELECT chat_telegram.telegram_id
            FROM chat_telegram
            ORDER BY abs(chat_telegram.telegram_id) DESC
            LIMIT 1

eff9bed64058278d5a47ae4714f620406d140d3c.query: UPDATE group_config SET chat_id = $1 WHERE chat_id = $2

f78fdca94944e40d61b918c5db894566061ea7ac.query:
SELECT is_admin
            FROM chat_administrator
            WHERE account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1) AND chat_id = lookup_chat_by_telegram_id($2)
            ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 1

ff63c318a1efa4f22bfe50fcdbe467ef14d37f04.query:
DELETE FROM source_notification
            WHERE account_id = lookup_account_by_telegram_id($1) AND hash <@ ($2, 0)
